column2: \Pedro's \"\"Almacenista Selection\"\" Amontillado is selected from the family Almacenista Garcia Jarana"
column3: who has dedicated his time to ageing and treasuring over 400 butts of old Sherry. This Amontillado is one of the true wines of Jerez. The subtle and delicate bouquet
column4: suggests notes of hazelnut on the nose
column5: yet with light reminders of yeast but smooth on the palate giving a fresh finish. This is an excellent match for soups and consommés
